document.masterDocTitle: Illustrated key to genera and catalogue of Mymaridae (Hymenoptera) in America north of Mexico

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Anaphes ( Anaphes ) iole : Yoshimoto, 1990: 52
(list); Viggiani, 1994: 476 (male genitalia), 480 (key);
Huber & Thuróczy, 2018: 24
(catalogue).

Anaphes iole anomocerus Girault, 1929
[428]: 13. Lectotype ♀ (USNM), designated by
Huber, 1992: 42
. TL : USA , locality not specified. Synonymy by
Huber & Rajakulendran, 1988: 894
. Girault, 1929 [428]: 13 (key).

Anagrus ovijentatus Crosby & Leonard, 1914a: 181
. Lectotype ♀ (CUIC), designated by
Huber, 1992: 42
. TL: USA , New York , Ithaca. Synonymy (implied) by Girault, 1929 [428]: 14; accepted by
Huber & Rajakulendran, 1988: 894
.

(key);

subSubSection.paragraph:

Salt Lake
City. Synonymy [in key] by Girault , 1929 [428]: 14.

subSubSection.paragraph:

,

,

,

.
